item.itunes:summary:
A real estate video tour featuring 358048 10th Line NE, Melancthon, Ontario.
This home features 3 Bedrooms and 2 Bathrooms.
This magnificent home is perfectly placed in a very private setting on a treed and pastoral 2.5 acres north of Shelburne. The immaculately restored 3 bedroom century home is a sight to see, with numerous upgrades and features throughout.
A flagstone walkway leads the way to a large traditional front covered porch with a finished ceiling and period lighting which welcomes you and your guests with style. You can enter the home either through the front entrance hall or via the side entrance, offering flexibility and privacy. The side entrance foyer is spectacularly designed and rich with detail. It features built-in storage for your convenience as well as mesmerizing slate flooring underneath.
The main level family room is open to the kitchen and perfect for relaxing or entertaining with family or friends. It includes an efficient wood burning stove for warming up the tone, pre-wired surround sound, a walk-out to the two-level deck, and renewed original plank flooring which extends throughout the home. The nearby living room offers yet another entertainment or relaxation option with a mood all its own. It includes a lovely gas fireplace for added ambiance surrounded by a custom-built wall unit as well as beautiful French doors.
The home's custom eat-in kitchen is a dream come true in every sense. It includes a breakfast bar for meals on the go, unique high-quality cabinetry, a marble-topped island for easy preparations, a bead board backsplash with under-cabinet lighting, quality oak countertops, a tongue-and-groove ceiling with recessed halogen lighting, bead board wainscoting and restored trim, a cozy eat-in area for intimate dining, an apron front sink, and slide and swing storage for the ultimate in form and function. A refrigerator and stove are also included for your convenience. Rounding off the main level is a nice 2 piece washroom for your family members and guests.
Inspiring, restored original railings guide the way upstairs to the 2nd level bedrooms. The master bedroom is a stylish and comfortable retreat in every sense. A cathedral ceiling and skylight are positioned above for an added layer of depth. There are two other inviting bedrooms on this level, each with its own charm and appeal. A luxurious 4 piece washroom is also found here for your family's preparations. It includes a relaxing jet tub for soaking away your stress along with a separate shower for comfort and flexibility. Finally, a nearby laundry room rounds off the level, complete with an included washer and dryer.
The home's exterior is a paradise within itself just waiting to be enjoyed. The large rear yard is perfect for fun or relaxation and is surrounded by spectacular foliage and extensive gardens. A 2 level deck makes for unlimited entertainment options and includes a dining area for memorable meals in the open air.
Additional home features include wonderful crown molding, 9 foot ceilings, large windows, steel roofing and well and pump all new in 2007, upgraded lighting fixtures, a shed and greenhouse in a large south-side field with many potential uses, and much more.
For more information or to schedule an appointment, contact kevin Flaherty by phone at 1-877-Flaherty or by email at kevin@flaherty.ca. To view this home's custom mobile optimized webpage for more photos, a map, and floorplans of this listing, text 4324 to 555000 or visit www.flaherty.ca today!

This home features 3 Bedrooms and 2 Bathrooms. This terrific property sits on 8.5 acres of land just 5 minutes from lovely Shelburne. The wonderful 3 bedroom, 2 washroom bungalow offers plenty of features along with spectacular views of a large pond and your own shoreline. A roomy front porch welcomes you and your guests, which is great for enjoying the open air.
The main level family room is great for relaxing or entertaining with family or friends. The eat-in kitchen is perfect for preparing meals in style. It includes a convenient breakfast bar, quality ceramic flooring that extends throughout both levels, nice cabinetry, and an eat-in area with a walk-out to the deck and pond views. Also included are a Jenn-Air range, a dishwasher, and a refrigerator for your convenience.
The main level master bedroom is perfect for unwinding after a long day for some rest. Also on this level are two other nice bedrooms for your family members to enjoy, each with its own unique style. Rounding off the level is a well-designed 4 piece washroom for your family members and guests.
The lower level apartment offers a range of possibilities, with a combined dining, living, and bedroom area that features a walk-out to the interlock patio. The apartment's kitchen area is great for crafting meals and comes complete with a refrigerator and a stove for your convenience. The nearby dining area is a nice bonus, and is great for enjoying meals with friends. Finally, for your preparations, a 3 piece washroom completes the apartment.
The home's exterior is fantastic as well, offering a range of pleasant outdoor possibilities. A large, 42 foot x 10 foot deck makes for an amazing place to entertain in the fresh air, and it's even fitted with a propane hook-up for easy barbecues. The rear yard itself is spacious and inspiring, offering plenty of room for family fun along with a wealth of spectacular views over the pond and beyond.
Additional home features include a lower level laundry with a washer and a dryer and recessed halogen lighting for setting the perfect tone.

This home features 3 Bedrooms and 3 Bathrooms. This incredible home sits on approximately 1/2 an acre of riverfront land in beautiful Hockley Valley. The 3 bedroom, 2 storey home is located just minutes from hiking and skiing, and even offers fishing in your own back yard. A lovely covered front porch welcomes you and your guests, along with manicured perennial gardens, making for a warm and inviting approach.
As you enter the home, the style and quality will immediately inspire you. The main level living room is perfect for entertaining or relaxing, and includes one of 2 walk-outs to the wrap-around veranda. The massive, modern eat-in kitchen is very well designed. It features a breakfast bar for easy meals, quality cabinetry, a glass tile backsplash, a sliding pantry for storage, and a large eat-in area with a walk-out to the covered veranda. Also included are a dishwasher, refrigerator, microwave, and stove for your convenience.
The family room is a relaxing retreat, and is perfect for enjoying family and friends. It includes hardwood floors, a walk-out to a patio, and a spectacular floor to ceiling fireplace with a wonderful insert for setting just the right tone. A nice office or den area is also on the main level comes complete with its own walk-out, and could even be used as a 4th bedroom if desired. A nice 3 piece bathroom is nearby for your family or guests, which includes stunning ceramic floors and a stained glass insert for an extra dash of style. Rounding off the main level is a laundry room also with ceramic floors that includes a washer and a dryer and garage access. A beautiful center joining hallway leads the way up to the 2nd level bedrooms.
The upstairs master bedroom is spacious and elegant and has two closets one of which is a walk-in. It includes a 2 piece ensuite bathroom for your preparations. There are two other well-designed bedrooms on this level, each with closets and a unique style you're family members will love. Finally, a 4 piece washroom completes the level, and a tub with a rain-head shower for your refreshment.
The exterior of the home is a masterpiece, with plenty of entertaining options. A large rear yard complete with a large stone patio makes for a wonderful outdoor recreation space. The wrap-around veranda is great for enjoying the open air in style, and includes a lovely porch swing for relaxing away the day. A west garden with a walkway further enhances the experience along with an east side yard.
The property's back boundary is set on an amazing and soothing river, offering an incredible perspective and a tranquil park-like setting. You’ll even see the passing salmon from time to time. A perfectly-placed patio sits by the riverside for enjoying the view. Finally, the "bunkie" riverside cabin is the icing on the cake, complete with its own bed for taking a snooze near the calming sounds of the river.
Additional home features include central air conditioning, 3 zone radiant water heater system powered by an oil fired boiler, and an oversized 2 car garage with included openers.
For more information or to schedule an appointment, contact kevin Flaherty by phone at 1-877-Flaherty or by email at kevin@flaherty.ca. To view this home's custom mobile optimized webpage for more photos, a map, and floorplans of this listing, text 4349 to 555000 or visit www.flaherty.ca today!

This home features 2+1 Bedrooms and 3 Bathrooms. This terrific home is located in sought after Fletcher's Meadow area of Brampton, just minutes from Highway 410. A beautiful staircase leads you to the upper level with its 9-foot ceilings and a spacious living room which is great for relaxing or entertaining. It includes quality hardwood flooring and a nice gas fireplace for warming up the tone.

It features a center island for easy preparations, high quality cabinetry with under-cabinet lighting, a stunning slate backsplash, stylish ceramic flooring, and an eat-in dining area with a walk-out to the balcony. A 2nd bedroom is also located on this level for your family members to enjoy as well as a 4 piece washroom for your convenience. The upper laundry makes for very efficient chores, and is fitted with a washer and a dryer.
The in-law suite apartment is completely self-sufficient, with its own entrance from the front lower entrance hall which also offers convenient garage access. The fully-functional kitchen is great for crafting meals, and includes a refrigerator and a stove for meal preparation. A dining area sits nearby, with a walk-out to the lovely patio. The home's unfinished basement offers even more potential in the future and includes a roughed-in washroom.
The home's exterior is magnificent as well, making for a splendid outdoor experience. The professionally landscaped rear yard offers a beautiful perspective in the open air, with well-manicured, raised gardens adding to the tone and allure.
The home includes 2 fridges, 2 stoves, 1 dishwasher and 2 washers and dryers. Quality features throughout include: hardwood and ceramic flooring, California shutters and crown molding. This wonderful residence is situated on a 1.9 acre river-front lot in the village of Creemore within walking distance to the Creemore public school and all the charm of small-town-Ontario. The 3 bedroom detached home is perfectly placed on a paved road and includes a wealth of features you'll be sure to love. A lovely interlock front walkway leads to the home's welcoming front covered porch, making for a spectacular approach.
As you enter the home, you'll immediately sense the style and quality throughout. A spectacular skylight adds light and dimension to the main hallway. The main level family room is perfect for relaxing or enjoying time with your loved ones. The nearby dining room is great for family meals and get togethers, and includes a walk out to one of two amazing decks. The home's living room is an enticing retreat that's perfect for entertaining in style. It includes a magnificent gas fireplace for warming up the mood.
The kitchen is a chef's dream and offers plenty of appealing extras. It includes a breakfast bar for easy meals, quality cabinetry, a corner cupboard for handy storage, quality ceramic floors, and a convenient eat-in area that has elegant hardwood floors underneath and a walk-out to a private deck. Also included are a dishwasher, built-in oven, refrigerator, and built-in stove top for preparing meals. Rounding off the main level is a 2 piece washroom for your comfort and a laundry room with garage access and an included washer and dryer.
The 2nd level master bedroom is a luxurious retreat, perfect for winding down after a long day. It includes a spectacular vaulted ceiling that enhances the perspective. The master's 5 piece en suite is perfectly designed for your preparations. It features an inviting jet tub for soaking away the day's worries as well as a separate shower. There are two other bedrooms on this level, each with its own personality and charm, one of which also includes a vaulted ceiling for added appeal. A 4 piece washroom completes the level for the convenience of your family members.
The home's basement level is the perfect get-away, with a spacious family room making for a splendid retreat. It features a wonderful gas fireplace for setting just the right mood on chilly nights. Also on this level is a recreation room for even more entertainment possibilities.
The home's exterior is a sight to see, with numerous features for your enjoyment. A wonderful rear deck offers a range of relaxing possibilities. It includes a BBQ hookup for easy grilling, and offers breathtaking views of the rear yard, trail, and woods beyond. Another deck is positioned on the side of the home as well, complete with an extendable awning for keeping the sun at bay. The entrance to the awe-inspiring forest is marked by a rustic arbour, with lovely gardens and a fire pit just beyond for enjoying the open air. A groomed trail leads the way to the incredible river. The Mad River marks the rear property line, offering even more recreation opportunities, including trout fishing. There's even a well-placed bench for relaxing by the riverside.
Additional home features include central air conditioning, a central vacuum, an oversized garage with an included opener, upgraded light fixtures and an automatic natural gas powered 10 Kilowatt backup generator for total piece of mind.

Whether you're looking for a business investment, a country escape, or a combination of both, 18522 Shaws Creek Road can certainly meet your needs. The property offers lush country views in every direction, with beautiful yards surrounding the house. It also boasts a mature wooded area approximately 15 acres in size with a long wide trail cut-through offering two access points.
The barn itself has been maintained and offers the charm of yesteryear with broad axe shaped beams. It has been in constant use for over 100 years and neighbours three large paddocks currently used for horses. The expanses of fields currently has approximately 47 acres under cultivation, and offers the possibly of sand and gravel aggregate extraction. The driveway leads you over a rock-edged culvert which provides access during the spring runoff. The water follows a defined path until it reaches a lower marsh area. The driveway then continues past the white fenced paddocks to the house, and finally to the drive shed and barn area.
While the Circa 1920 concrete block 2 story farm house and drive shed could benefit from some TLC, they have already received many repairs and updates. The house itself was fitted with new windows in 2001, a new high efficiency propane furnace in 2003, and both the house and barn were rewired in 2004. The 3 bedroom house is 1558 sq. ft. which does not include a large summer kitchen and storage room. The second level of the home also offers a large walk-in closet off the main hall that could be used as an office or storage area.
The house, barn and approximately 10 acres of pasture and paddocks is currently occupied by a long term tenant who has expressed a desire to work out an agreement with a new owner. The current residential tenancy agreement generates a $1,350 per month income and does not include utilities. This rental agreement offers flexibility to the new owner as it is on a month-to-month basis and could be terminated with notice.
Permission was granted in 1994 for an area of the property fronting along the Charleston Side Road for a wayside pit operation and the extraction of 200 thousand metric tonnes of aggregate, however this operation was not carried out. Presently a large portion of the farm has been identified in the Town of Caledon Official Plan as a sand and gravel aggregate resource land. Regardless of the direction taken, the future owner will have a range of possibilities to choose from with respect to this property’s investment potential.

This beautifully decorated and lovingly maintained home is situated on a private and spectacular property near the Hockley Valley. The large, detached 2+3 Bedroom bungalow is positioned on 5.5 rolling acres In Mono, and features a finished lower level walkout that is currently used as the popular "Hockley Hills Bed & Breakfast". There is an option to purchase the lower level chattels and marketing for the bed & breakfast, and financial statements are available on request. The Host's quarters are on the main floor - and are completely separate and private from the guest areas. This floor features a spacious living room with a 14' ceiling, wood beams, maple wood floors, and a fireplace which divides the living room and dining room. The gorgeous formal dining room offers a walkout to a private balcony overlooking a patio garden and rolling hills. Off the living room is the sun-filled solarium - which is pictured here as an office. The large, well-lit kitchen offers plenty of workspace, and features an included high-end fridge and stove. Also on the main floor is an elegant master bedroom with hardwood floors and crown molding, as well as an extra guest bedroom for privacy and relaxation. A 4 piece bathroom rounds off this level, and is complimented by a magnificent jacuzzi bathtub. The main level of the home faces south overlooking mature gardens, blue pines, spruce and cedars. The lower level is currently operated as Hockley Hills Bed and Breakfast. In operation for five years, this B&B is one of the most popular in the area, awarded Best Accommodation by The Hills of Headwaters Tourism Association in 2006! This level includes a gorgeous and spacious family room with a wood-burning fireplace, a bright and inviting solarium which is perfect for the guests that includes a convenient breakfast bar as well as its own gas fireplace, and a spectacular living room with soaring ceilings and a fireplace of its own. Each of the three bed & breakfast's bedrooms offer their own stunning design and appeal, as well as marvelous hardwood floors, and one bedroom even has its own 3 piece bath. A separate lower level bathroom is here for your guests comfort, and features an inviting sauna for the ultimate experience. Also on this level is a bed & breakfast store and a computer area for the ultimate in convenience. A separate and fully-powered workshop also exists and can accommodate a number of uses, with its own entrance from the outside. Other features include newer security windows and doors throughout, high-quality one-way blinds, newly upgraded garage doors, a new alarm system, newer shingles, a newer propane furnace with an air purifier, and a newer UV system. This home also has high speed internet available. Designed by its original owner 23 years ago, this unique home overlooks 5.5 wooded and rolling acres. A walking trail has been maintained that winds around the upper periphery of the property, making for the ultimate atmosphere both indoors and out. This home features 4 Bedrooms and 3 Bathrooms.
Situated on .54 acres of land in beautiful Orangeville, this large and magnificent 4 bedroom home is picture perfect. It is complimented by a gorgeous 16x34 in ground heated salt water pool which was added new in 2005, making for the ultimate in family fun and recreation.
As you enter the home you will be greeted by elegance and stunning design along with a spectacular curved staircase in the grand foyer. The large living room is wonderful for entertaining guests, and features incredible hardwood floors which also run into the neighboring dining room. This dining room is great for enjoying relaxing meals with family and friends, and comes complete with an elegant lighting upgrade.
The family room is warm and inviting, making for a great place to relax. The gas fireplace will keep you cozy and warm on even the coldest of nights. The spacious kitchen has a brand new counter-top and backsplash, gorgeous wooden cupboards, stylish upgraded lighting and several high-quality appliances are included. The kitchen even features a convenient eat-in area and breakfast bar for easy meals on the go. Rounding off the main floor is a well-placed laundry room and an updated colorful 2 piece bathroom for total comfort.
The 2nd floor master bedroom offers plenty of space along with laminate floors, amazing California shutters, his and hers closets, and a 4 piece master ensuite with a step shower and a luxurious soaker tub for total relaxation. Also upstairs are three other well-appointed bedrooms for your family members to enjoy, each with their own style and charm. Finally, an additional updated 5 piece bath finishes off the 2nd level for your family's total convenience. The magnificent detail and craftsmanship of this home is further enhanced by fresh paint, spectacular 7 inch trim, beautifully-crafted crown molding, faux blinds, newer windows, new shingles in 2007, newer laminate floors and Berber carpet.
Outside, the incredible pool and pool area make for a total family getaway. The large in-ground, heated salt-water pool features a diving board and steps, and is even accompanied by a well-placed pool house. Finally, the home's surrounding lawn and landscaping is absolutely stunning and must be seen!
